mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.offer (title, price, description, category, img_path, condition, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{price}, #{description}, #{category}, #{imgPath}, #{condition}::condition_enum, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT title, description, img_path, price, user_id, condition::text FROM public.offer WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE public.offer SET title = #{offer.title}, price = #{offer.price}, description = #{offer.description}, img_path = #{offer.imgPath}, condition = #{offer.condition}::condition_enum, user_id = #{offer.userId} WHERE id = #{id};
